sqlMap.statement:
SELECT * FROM (
SELECT @NO := @NO + 1 AS ROWNO, PRPTYGROUPNAME, PRPTYGROUPDESC FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIRM07, (SELECT @NO := 0) R
UPPER(PrptyGroupName) LIKE CONCAT( '%' , #searchPrptyGroupName# , '%' )
) ORGTABLE WHERE ROWNO BETWEEN #startNum# AND #endNum#

SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTALCOUNT FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIRM07
UPPER(PrptyGroupName) LIKE CONCAT( '%' , #searchPrptyGroupName# , '%' )
SELECT PRPTYGROUPNAME, PRPTYGROUPDESC FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIRM07 WHERE PrptyGroupName = #prptyGroupName#
SELECT PRPTYNAME, PRPTY2VAL FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIRM08 WHERE PrptyGroupName = #prptyGroupName# ORDER BY 1
SELECT PRPTY2VAL FROM $schemaId$.tseairm08 WHERE PRPTYGROUPNAME =#prptyGroupName# AND PRPTYNAME=#prptyName#
INSERT INTO $schemaId$.TSEAIRM08 (PRPTYGROUPNAME, PRPTYNAME, PRPTY2VAL ) VALUES('Monitoring', #prptyName#, #prpty2Val#) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE PRPTY2VAL = #prpty2Val#
